source.title: Liliaceae

leads.lead_text: Roots tuberous; corm ovoid; flowers usually 2 or 3 per inflorescence; perianth lobes 4.5–6 times as long as wide; seeds 1–1.5 mm diam.; leaves to 2 mm wide

Roots fibrous (sometimes fleshy); corm more or less cylindric; flowers usually 1, occasionally 2, per inflorescence; perianth lobes 2–5 times as long as broad; seeds 1.5–2.5 mm diam.; leaves to 4 mm wide
